nodes.text: Hidden Depths is an adventure for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny roleplaying game. It is included in the Star Wars: Force and Destiny Game Master's Kit, released on July 30, 2015.

A group of Force-sensitives discover that recent geographical upheavals on the remote planet Phemis have revealed a cache of rubat crystals, a long-controlled mineral. The group infiltrates the canyon where the cave is, and traverses the area to find a crystal for each of them. By the time they get back to their transport, they find it has been captured by Ironarms. They defeat the stormtrooper, and escape the planet, ready to build their own lightsabers.

Hidden Depths suggests that it takes place after the Lessons from the Past adventure in Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, although players may rework it to fit their own campaign. The adventure also suggests that the Gamemaster work in various challenges such as Viper probe droids or Phemis creatures.
